Source code for fastai.core

from .imports import *
from .torch_imports import *


[docs]def sum_geom(a,r,n):
    return a*n if r==1 else math.ceil(a*(1-r**n)/(1-r))


conv_dict = {np.dtype('int8'): torch.LongTensor, np.dtype('int16'): torch.LongTensor,
    np.dtype('int32'): torch.LongTensor, np.dtype('int64'): torch.LongTensor,
    np.dtype('float32'): torch.FloatTensor, np.dtype('float64'): torch.FloatTensor}


[docs]def T(a):
    a = np.array(a)
    if a.dtype in (np.int8, np.int16, np.int32, np.int64):
        return torch.LongTensor(a.astype(np.int64))
    if a.dtype in (np.float32, np.float64):
        return torch.FloatTensor(a.astype(np.float32))
    raise NotImplementedError



[docs]def V_(x):  return to_gpu(x, async=True) if isinstance(x, Variable) else Variable(to_gpu(x, async=True))


[docs]def V(x):   return [V_(o) for o in x] if isinstance(x,list) else V_(x)


[docs]def VV_(x): return to_gpu(x, async=True) if isinstance(x, Variable) else Variable(to_gpu(x, async=True), volatile=True)


[docs]def VV(x):  return [VV_(o) for o in x] if isinstance(x,list) else VV_(x)



[docs]def to_np(v):
    if isinstance(v, Variable): v=v.data
    return v.cpu().numpy()



[docs]def to_gpu(x, *args, **kwargs):
    if torch.cuda.is_available():
        return x.cuda(*args, **kwargs)
    else:
        return x



[docs]def noop(*args, **kwargs): return



[docs]def split_by_idxs(seq, idxs):
    last, sl = 0, len(seq)
    for idx in idxs:
        yield seq[last:idx]
        last = idx
    yield seq[last:]



[docs]def trainable_params_(m):
    return [p for p in m.parameters() if p.requires_grad]



[docs]def chain_params(p):
    if isinstance(p, (list,tuple)):
        return list(chain(*[trainable_params_(o) for o in p]))
    return trainable_params_(p)



[docs]def set_trainable_attr(m,b):
    m.trainable=b
    for p in m.parameters(): p.requires_grad=b



[docs]def apply_leaf(m, f):
    c = children(m)
    if isinstance(m, nn.Module): f(m)
    if len(c)>0:
        for l in c: apply_leaf(l,f)



[docs]def set_trainable(l, b):
    apply_leaf(l, lambda m: set_trainable_attr(m,b))



[docs]def SGD_Momentum(momentum):
    return lambda *args, **kwargs: optim.SGD(*args, momentum=momentum, **kwargs)



[docs]def one_hot(a,c): return np.eye(c)[a]
